title: CSE THROUGH KCET
content: What rank should I get to get CSE in PES main branch , what would be the fees

comments.body: <1000(gm) , last year it was 1006 or something.fees is 112573.0 to be precise.(fees is for 2021-2025) batch , it could be 5 to 10 k more for u guys.
What do you mean by gm , I am new to this stuff

Gm is general merit , its a category. Gm means general and no reservation  at all. 
If u do have reservations then u have flexibility in rank. Check out for websites that give rank based on your category.
ðŸ’€ðŸ’€< 1000 In kcet is like 160+/180 isn't it (approx)
not really with good board scores a kcet score of 130 to 140 would land u  below1000
What are you on lol last year it closed at 1.6k(last round)
Is the ranking same for bms and rv too ?

Ranking?
You mean cutoff
For rv cse it ended at 360 last year
For Bmsce cse it ended at 1k approx
What's with the language brother ? You can put your point across in a nicer way without having to bring the other person down.
